Legal Ali Reza Hayati | 2020 May 07 Agreement

By using or accessing the “Ali Reza Hayati’s Personal Site” (“I”, “Me”, “My”, “We”, “Us”, “Our”), accessible from “https://alirezahayati.com” (the “Website”, the “Site”, the “Service”), You agree to be bound and abide by the terms and conditions of this Terms of Use Agreement (“Agreement”).

Copyright

Unless otherwise is noted, all notes, writings, photos, videos, and sounds are published under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

You can copy and redistribute the material in any medium or format and remix, transform, and build upon the material for any purpose, even commercially. I don’t require attribution but if you like to give me credit, I would appreciate it.

If you remix, transform, or build upon the material, you must distribute your contributions under the same license as the original. You may do so in any reasonable manner, but not in any way that suggests the licensor endorses you or your use.

All logos and/or avatars are belongings of the owners and you can’t use, share, modify, or redistribute them in any format or medium without consent, unless otherwise is stated.

Privacy

The Website does not collect any personal information other than data you provide such as your name, your email address, your website address, your IP address, and your web browser’s user-agent information. All these data are kept encrypted and will never be shared with anyone.

All of the data you provide may be kept for an unlimited period of time but can be purged at your request in any time.

Server logs will be purged on a daily basis.

Personal views disclaimer

Any views or opinions expressed here at any moment are my own and not those of my employer, unless it’s specifically stated.

Furthermore, one of the benefits of having an open mind is that my thoughts and opinions will eventually change. There is no shame at all in changing personal views and beliefs over newly presented evidence.

Posts disclaimer

All posts are published with no guarantee of safety. All posts are published as-is with no warranty whatsoever so only person who is responsible for any harm or damage in any way is you yourself.

Comments

This website and I are not responsible for views and comments of visitors. If a visitor leaves a comment, that visitor (person) is responsible for its comment.

When visitors leave comments on the site I collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

Your email address may be used to show an avatar received by Gravatar. Your submitted data will remain on this site as long as I maintain this Website. You can ask for your data to be purged.

This Website uses Akismet to reduce spams. You can learn about their privacy policy and way they process comment data on their privacy policy page.

Embedded content from other websites

For responses to URLs, such as responding to a post or article, this site allows the storage of data around the post/article in order to generate a rich citation. Items such as author name and image, summary of the text, embeds provided by third-party site, etc may be stored and are solely to provide this context. We will remove any of this on request. Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

External links

This Site may contain links to external pages or media that are not handled or controlled by Us. We are not responsible for their content and the validity of them in any way. A link to an external page or media does not mean that We endorse the linked content.

Last update: 2020 December 23

Ali Reza Hayati Social activist, privacy advocate, and software libre adherent. Subscribe to author feed

points.title: Content is published under a free license instead of a bilateral one
points.quoteText: Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 (CC-BY-SA), unless otherwise is noted.

points.title: The service will resist legal requests for user information where reasonably possible
points.status: The privacy policy states "We won’t track you or use any tracking service (third-party or not) to save/collect your information. We don’t have a logging policy which means even usual logs (such as IP addresses) won’t be saved on our end or on the cloud.".

points.title: You are allowed to quote their content with attribution
points.status: The copyright notice states "Unless otherwise noted, texts and notes are published under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license.".

points.title: The terms for this service are easy to read
points.status: It's written very simple and short.

points.title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
points.status:
The service states "We may update this policies from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting new policies on this page.

You are advised to review this legal page periodically for any changes. Changes to this page are effective when they are posted on this page or at the time set on top of this page.".

points.title: No need to register
points.status: The service doesn't asks for personal information and they don't have a registration system.

points.title: No logs are being kept
points.status: The service states "We won’t track you or use any tracking service (third-party or not) to save/collect your information. We don’t have a logging policy which means even usual logs (such as IP addresses) won’t be saved on our end or on the cloud.".
